name: Bob the Postcat's Holiday Space Adventure
name_original: Bob the Postcat's Holiday Space Adventure
description:
December, 2065. The crew of the Spaceship Caterpillar is getting ready for the holiday party. But where is your invite?

You are Bob, the  humble postcat, and it looks like your party invite hasn’t arrived yet…

Made in around 2 weeks for the Secret Santa Jam 2022 for Caterpillargames.

Controls-

  • WASD/Arrow keys- Move around/Speed Up Text 
  • Space/Enter- Interact
  • Tip: Press the fullscreen icon in the bottom right corner!

Credits-

  • Music- Carol of the Bells midi from  https://www.westnet.com/Holiday/midi/
  • Audio implemented using add bitsy audio hack by Mark Wonnacott https://candle.itch.io/bitsy-audio
  • Thumbnail Font- ZX Spectrum by myname5749 from https://www.dafont.com

I may update this game in the new year to add a few improvements/additional content, so keep an eye out ;)
